name: Star Trek: Starfleet Academy: Starship Bridge Simulator
overview: It's high tension at the Klingon Neutral Zone. You must get past the blockage and deliver supplies to the Federation colonists on a planet claimed by the Klingon Empire. One false move could lead to war and even millions of causalities. Your reputation at the Academy is at stake. Star Trek: Starfleet Academy, The Bridge Simulator has over 15 simulated missions in the final frontier. Command five different starships, from science vessels to Constitution-class heavy cruisers on a variety of missions ranging from scientific research...to diplomacy...to battle. Star Trek: Starfleet Academy, The Bridge Simulator puts you on the bridge of Starfleet's finest vessels. In the toughest simulations that the Federation can devise.
